com.lukflug.panelstudio.container

Class Container<T extends IComponent>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.component.ComponentBase
      • com.lukflug.panelstudio.container.Container<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of components that are members of this container
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, IContainer<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FixedContainer, HorizontalContainer, VerticalContainer

    public abstract class Container<T extends IComponent>
extends ComponentBase
implements IContainer<T>
    Base class for containers.
